sourcesContent:
import {Grid, Button} from 'semantic-ui-react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react' function EditMembership ({onPatch}) { const initialData = { name: '', email: '', phone: '', } const [memb, setMemb] = useState(null) const [formData, setFormData] = useState(initialData) let { id } = useParams() useEffect(()=> { fetch(`/memberships/${id}`) .then(res => res.json()) .then(setMemb) },[id]) console.log(memb) function handleChange (e) { const {name, value} = e.target setFormData({...formData, [name]: value}) } function handlePatch() { fetch(`/memberships/${id}/`, { method: "PATCH", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", }, body: JSON.stringify(formData), }) .then(() => onPatch()) } return (
) } export default EditMembership;
